TopicTitle: What is RMB and why can't I see the vectoring range of engines in VAB anymore?

Articles.Content: When I hover over the cursor an engine in VAB, I can no longer see the thrust vectoring range, without which KSP is useless. Also, what is RMB??? How can I see more info? I love KSP to bits and was happy to pay for it but the lack of documentation is friggin outrageous.
... and incidentally, the RMB, when you rightclick on the part, is what lets you see the stats.
That's great, thank you very much for the prompt answer!
